css.title: title
css.codeBlock:
<style>
.facts-wrapper {
	background-image: url(background-topography-white-1.jpg);
	background-size: cover;
}
.facts-cards img {
	width: 15%;
	margin-bottom: 1.4em;
}
.facts-card-blue {
	align-items: center;
	background: linear-gradient(to right, #0D64EF, #3D83F2);
	border-radius: 10px;
	padding: 2.2em 1.6em 3em;
}
.facts-card-black {
	align-items: center;
	background: linear-gradient(to right, #191919, #474747);
	border-radius: 10px;
	padding: 2.2em 1.6em 3em;
}
.facts-card-black, .facts-card-blue {
	box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.18) 0px 2px 4px;
}
.facts-card-blue h5, .facts-card-black h5 {
	font-size: 1.2rem;
}
@media (min-width: 991px) {
	.facts-card-blue h5, .facts-card-black h5 {
		font-size: 1.1rem;
	}
	.facts-cards img {
		width: 17%;
		margin-bottom: 2em;
	}
}
</style>
